Posts.EditableText:
I am sorry to bring you sad news on behalf of the Spanish IF community: Jhames, the maintainer of the Spanish version of the Quest library, passed away on February 12 after complications from a surgical operation. We thought you should know since he used to be active in this forums and collaborate with Quest development.
God rest his soul.
Posts.HTML:
I am sorry to bring you sad news on behalf of the Spanish IF community: Jhames, the maintainer of the Spanish version of the Quest library, passed away on February 12 after complications from a surgical operation. We thought you should know since he used to be active in this forums and collaborate with Quest development.
God rest his soul.

Posts.EditableText: That is really sad, thanks for letting us know. I will definitely miss his enthusiasm, and his Spanish translations were always much appreciated. May he rest in peace.
Posts.HTML: That is really sad, thanks for letting us know. I will definitely miss his enthusiasm, and his Spanish translations were always much appreciated. May he rest in peace.
